channel.title: Server on My blog
channel.description: Recent content in Server on My blog

item.title: ML350p
item.description:
Another server, HP ML350P Gen8.

I wanted a server to eventually place 4 GPUs to run LLMs.

AMD MI50 did not want to run at all. Server would POST, but in Linux I would get a atombios stuck in dmesg. I tried more or less every settings, kernel param, nothing worked.

Finally I flashed the Radeon Pro VII firmware and not only does it work in ML350p, it will also POST on T7600 and output video on the single mini display port.
